tool_description:
**STOCKX API**

Our real-time data feeds deliver the insights you need to create value in the world of sneaker trading, collecting, and reselling.
name: Stockx pricing data and market analytics
title: Stockx pricing data and market analytics
tool_name: Stockx pricing data and market analytics

api_list.name: data
api_list.description:
Receive stockx data.

- sku (required): The SKU or keywords of the product. Example: DD1391-100, Jordan 1 High Mocha
- currency (required): The currency code to be used. Example: EUR
- sellerLevel (required): The level of the seller, value can range from 1 to 5.
- colorMode (required): The color mode of the request, use either light or dark
- marketName (required): The market name in ISO code (e.g. GB, US) to receive global sales activity use 'global' (note: only last sales available)
- payout (optional normally set to True): This paramater can be set to False in order to return the listing prices instead of the payout prices
- sizeSales (optional normally set to False): This paramater can be set to True in order to return the amount of sales for each size in the last 31 days (this will suppress the sales chart graph)

required_parameters.name: sku
required_parameters.description: Ue the sku or keywords for the product search
